name: ATTACK OF THE MURDER HORNETS
description:
"A small town crew of beekeepers and scientists band together to protect their quiet Washington community from the Murder Hornet." The fate of the North American honeybee hangs in the balance.

ATTACK OF THE MURDER HORNETS is a short, retro inspired, pixel horror game based on ATTACK OF THE MURDER HORNETS, a film by Michael Paul Stephenson exclusively on Discovery+.

In addition to watching ATTACK OF THE MURDER HORNETS on Discovery and Discovery+,  join the conversation on social media by using the hashtag #MurderHornets and following Discovery on Facebook, Twitter, and Instagram.

Controls:
- WASD/arrow keys: move character
- SPACE: interact

Credits:
Game by TorpleDook
Creative director AIRDORF
Produced by James Hendershot and OJO Entertainment
